reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was OK. Typically french so clean and charming but at the same time very very basic. It has a nice pub downstairs where you can drink and eat, but for the rest there is not a lot to do. Rooms were failry small but OK. Maybe the fact that the wheather was appalling the weekend we visited influences my review. Still, a decent but average place
reviews.title: A nice hotel in a failry boring place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this quaint hotel for one night and found it a very pleasant experience. The room was on the 2nd floor (no lift) and was bright and clean with a good sized bathroom. A very traditional French hotel room that made a welcome change from the characterless chains. There was a lovely sea view.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with sea views

reviews.text: Its not in a particularily quiet spot with weekend revellers making a bit of noise in the streets outside for much of the night but that is to be expected at the height of the holiday season.
reviews.title: Overnight stop, quiet, clean, comfy - no English spoken

reviews.text: Breakfast in the morning was a lovely well presented continental buffet with good quality products and helpful staff.
reviews.title: Pleasantly quaint

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Very charming hotel and very friendly staff
